versions.updateLog:
- Added news
- Added update alert
- Added version display in settings
- Added missing fault codes for the SINAMICS DCM

- Added more devices
- Categorized devices
- Added a button to open internet link to devices that have a website
- Added a button to show manuals relating to the device
- Users can now change text size in settings
- Updated setting UIs to be more user friendly
- Fixed minor UIs bugs
